author: cms-ngt-hlt
body:
#### PR description

Introduce MET Validation at HLT, for Phase-2. The plots are added under ```DQMData/Run 1/HLT/Run summary/JetMET/METValidation/```. The quantities being validated are standard kinematic variables plus the MET resolution, response and significance, considering ```hltPFMET```, ```hltPFPuppiMET``` and ```hltPFPuppiMETTypeOne```.

The PR logically follows #48722.

#### PR validation

Currently being tested with:

```bash
NEVENTS=1000
GEOM="ExtendedRun4D110"
ERA="Phase2C17I13M9"
CONDS="auto:phase2_realistic_T33"
PROCMODS="ticl_v5" # ticl_barrel, alpaka
VALIDSEQ="@hltValidation"
HLTSEQ="75e33" # NGTScouting

function mystep2() {
    cmsDriver.py step2 -s L1P2GT,HLT:"${HLTSEQ}",DQM:trackingMonitorHLT,VALIDATION:"${VALIDSEQ}" \
				 --conditions "${CONDS}" \
				 --procModifier "${PROCMODS}" \
				 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW,DQMIO \
				 -n ${NEVENTS} \
				 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT,DQMIO \
				 --geometry "${GEOM}" \
				 --era "${ERA}" \
				 --customise SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/aging.customise_aging_1000 \
				 --filein file:/eos/cms/store/relval/CMSSW_15_1_0_pre5/RelValWprimeToLNu_M2000_14TeV/GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW/PU_150X_mcRun4_realistic_v1_STD_Run4D110_PU-v1/2580000/00013e0f-1c5d-4097-8882-78035be2f856.root, ...
				 --fileout file:step2.root \
				 --nThreads 24 \
				 --hltProcess HLTX \
				 --processName HLTX \
				 --pileup AVE_200_BX_25ns \
				 --pileup_input das:/RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_15_1_0_pre5-150X_mcRun4_realistic_v1_STD_MinBias_Run4D110_GenSim-v1/GEN-SIM \
				 --inputCommands='keep *, drop *_hlt*_*_HLT, drop triggerTriggerFilterObjectWithRefs_l1t*_*_HLT' 
}

function mystep3() {
    cmsDriver.py step3 -s HARVESTING:"${VALIDSEQ}" \
				 --conditions "${CONDS}" \
				 --procModifier "${PROCMODS}" \
				 --mc \
				 --geometry "${GEOM}" \
				 --scenario pp \
				 --filetype DQM \
				 --era "${ERA}" \
				 -n ${NEVENTS} \
				 --hltProcess HLTX \
				 --filein file:step2_inDQM.root \
				 --fileout file:step3.root
}

mystep2 && mystep3
```

where the files correspond to 200PU Wprime RelVal samples produced under ```CMSSW_15_1_0_pre4```.

#### Plotting

The outputs shown [here](https://bfontana.web.cern.ch/bfontana/MET_Valid_TICLv5/Wprime/) can be produced with:

```bash
for amet in "hltPFMET" "hltPFPuppiMET" "hltPFPuppiMETTypeOne"; do python3 Validation/RecoMET/scripts/makeHLTMETValidationPlots.py --file Run/DQM_1000_QCD.root --odir /eos/user/b/bfontana/www/MET_Valid_TICLv5/QCD -l QCD --met ${amet}; done
```
title: Met Validation for Phase-2 HLT
